text: Liperi is a municipality in North Karelia, Finland. It had about 12,500 living there in April 2014. The municipalities next to it are Heinävesi, Joensuu, Kontiolahti, Polvijärvi, Rääkkylä, Savonlinna and Outokumpu. ==Happenings== *Karelia-soutu == Other websites == * The official Liperi page Category:Municipalities of North Karelia
title: Liperi
